Amazing!  This was the best meal that I have ever had.  The food was delicious and the service was excellent.  The food was so tasty and beautifully presented.  The menu had full and half portions for many of the dishes which allowed you to create a nice tasting menu.  I was hesitant to write such a positive review because I don't want it to be too crowded when I return, however, it really is deserving of the praise.  My husband and I have eaten out all over the world and this experience really stands out.
